name: Ext_R4_SearchParameter_modifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.SearchParameter.modifier for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SearchParameter.modifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SearchParameter|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: missing | exact | contains | not | text | in | not-in | below | above | type | identifier | ofType
element.definition: A modifier supported for the search parameter.
element.comment: `SearchParameter.modifier` maps to R5 `SearchParameter.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: missing | exact | contains | not | text | in | not-in | below | above | type | identifier | ofType
element.definition: A modifier supported for the search parameter.
element.comment: `SearchParameter.modifier` maps to R5 `SearchParameter.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A supported modifier for a search parameter.
